name: electron-react-webpack-boilerplate
description: A minimal desktop app that uses electron, react, webpack, and babel.
author: Hamza AK

scripts.package:win: npm run "build:react" && electron-packager . electron-app --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=dist/assets/app.ico --prune=true --out=builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Minimal Electron Boilerplate"
